citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1150 on
14-MAR-19.
I arrived at the facility at 11:50am. The house appeared empty. No one answered when I knocked on the door. I
called and left a message at the number I had on file. 10 minutes later, a business colleague called back to let me
know that the licensee's business had been repossessed and that no one could locate the licensee.
Additional Inspectors
Graves Alicia, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1150 on
14-MAR-19.
I arrived at the facility at 11:50am. The house appeared empty. No one answered when I knocked on the door. I
called and left a message at the number I had on file. 10 minutes later, a business colleague called back to let me
know that the licensee's business had been repossessed and that no one could locate the licensee.
Additional Inspectors
Graves Alicia, Animal Care Inspector
